name: Jurassic Park III: Island Attack
description: Jurassic Park III: Island Attack (known as Jurassic Park III: Advanced Action in Japan and Jurassic Park III: Dino Attack in Europe; originally known as Jurassic Park III: Primal Fear) is a video game for the Game Boy Advance. Island Attack is loosely based on the 2001 film Jurassic Park III.
